titles: A pleasant comedie, called VVily beguilde The chiefe actors be these: a poore scholler, a rich foole, and a knaue at a shifte.
publisher: Printed by H[umphrey] L[ownes] for Clement Knight: and are to be solde at his shop, in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Holy Lambe,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
